section.title:
site types
master list of Site Types
section.para: Because sites may serve multiple purposes—as warehouses, stores, etc.—the concept of site types allows you to categorize how sites are used. To access the master list of site types, go to Inventory > Setup then Master Information > Site Types from the left-side menu. The following screen will appear.
The Site Types screen displays information on all existing site types, including site type code and site type description.
